event.title: CodeHub at Workshop Wednesdays
event.description:
Every other Wednesday we are joining Women's Tech Hub at their Workshop Wednesdays at Desklodge House.

Below you can find the events that are taking place this time. You can find a more detailed description on WTH's own signup page. https://www.meetup.com/Womens-Tech-Hub-Bristol/events/cjhfmrybccbmc/

Sign up on this page here if you would like to use the co-working area, or attend anything that hasn't got its own page. For mentoring, WebDev101 or this page are both fine.

Happening on this day:

WebDev101
https://www.meetup.com/CodeHub-Bristol/events/qlsslrybccbmc/
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bristol Data Science and Machine Learning Study Group
